R code is triple backtick with r in brackets as header, code in center


backtick is lowercase tilda, not single apostrophe

'''{r}
dim(iris)
2 ^ 2
1+8
'''

versus

```{r}
dim(iris)
2 ^ 2
1+8
```



eval=FALSE in brackets to prevent code from running, display only
echo=FALSE to hide code, results only
